entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as the one who cannot go home. She is described as having angry tears sparkling in her eyes, indicating that she is upset and emotional.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one Ginny looks at beseechingly. He shakes his head, indicating that he cannot help her.

relationships.description: Ginny looked at Harry beseechingly, hoping for his help or assistance. This is described in the text as Ginny 'look[ing] at him beseechingly'.
Harry shook his head, indicating that he cannot help or assist Ginny. This is described in the text as Harry 'shaking his head'.
